reviews.review: Esse jogo tinha tudo para ser bom. Dá para se divertir com poucos killers, são eles: Trapper, huntress, nurse. De resto, os desenvolvedores estão totalmente focados em como deixar os killers 200% pay to win para encher o bolso de dinheiro. A maior e mais óbvia prova disso são os momentos em que os killers já ganharam e mesmo assim o jogo obriga você a ter que esperar toda a baboseira do end game, isso se o killer não for um jogador infantil e ficar "trollando" tornando a partida refém. Se você gosta de jogar com todos os aspectos de um jogo favoráveis a você, esse é seu game. Jogue de killer, compre os mais apelões que existem, ou então vá para o CS:GO crie uma partida de bots desarmados e fique matando eles. Agora, se você gosta de jogar mais competitivamente e de forma balanceada, busque outros jogos e espere que alguma empresa mais séria com desenvolvedores mais dedicados desbanquem esse game em questão de meses. Esse é o primeiro de uma série de "games assimétricos" que quando uma empresa séria lançar, terá uma fuga absurda de players que querem jogar do lado mais desafiador sem apelação e vantagens que tornam uma partida quase impossível de ser ganha.

this game is so full of toxic people it drains you like a vileplume. when i played this game when it came out i had fun thinking the goal was to survive, so being stealthy was key. now i feel like people don't even know why they're playing this anymore, because it seems like everyone is so focused on getting points that they don't even have fun or fear.
i hate this game so much i reccomend it
Toxic players, toxic gameplay, much more fun to watch than to play. Long queue times, dodgers, trolls. No thanks.

Its interesting but i guess just not my type of game. Tons of progression, lots of characters, 1st game of its type as far as i know but it feels like the same thing match after match, ive never had a wait time for a lobby be under 2 minutes (closer to 5 for a match as killer) , the game heavily favors the killer, and the loading screens usually take a solid minute or so just to get into the match.
Fuck this game and I'll see you again tomorrow

Very nice game, it's got it's bugs but I haven't run into any game breaking bugs but if you can't handle mature things like Freddy's (2013) lore i'd watch out because some people are super sensitive about that stuff I guess
bugado e desbalanceado jogo ruim fudido horrivel =)

Best Queue Simulator so far.
Didnt get to use flashlights, because its not even dark in the trial. Any suggestions why to equip flashlights instead of the other items?
Im glad that the developers added an opportunity for Legion mains to take a break from running, in front of hooked survivors.

Looking forward to see the new Kicking Simulator, which will be added to DbD soon. c:
This game is so much better on p.c and I would  recommend this to everyone

Could have been a fun game...
- killers are too OP especially with some combination of perks and add-ons 
- match making balance is broken 
- almost impossible to win with some randoms 
- is it even possible to get past rank 7 without boosting or exploiting? 
- hitboxes are broken 
- inputs are broken 
- optimisation is bad 
- impossible to wigle out of killers hands. At least 5% of speed should be added 
My friends kept asking me to get this game but I tried avoding it for as long as possible knowing how bad it would be. So this review is an expected outcome and if you are reading this, try to stand your ground and avoid this money milking simulator.

Update 18/09/2021: Still shit. Didnt change anything for the survivours. Added a new OP killer. LOL. Killers can stand on hatches and block the survivours from escaping. 10/10 feature (no).
Juego divertido y mas si tenes panas

Что ж. Эта игра ужасна, но и в то же время прекрасна. Ужасно тут много всего.  НО. Есть и хорошие стороны. Когда то была физика Кейт. Теперь нет. Но все еще остались стоны Джейн и оры Джеффа. Хочется так же напомнить про оры Духа. А Стив это просто вишенка на торте. Вы ожидаете еще плюсы? А фиг. Их больше нет.(а если серьезно, то дбд это игра которая не идеальна, но западает прямо в сердечко. Мы любим тебя дбд <3)

I love this game. And I mean, LOVE IT. I've played for about two years now, and I still enjoy it. 

But I want to warn people interested in getting the game. If you have internet issues, do not spend your money on this game. It is extremely fun if you can play it but I promise you that you'll get disconnected if you have any sort of internet issues, and get temp banned. My internet is p shitty, half the time it works, half the time it doesn't. When it doesn't I have to wait 30 min just because I got disconnected because of my internet. 

I have it as a personal rule that I shouldn't ever disconnect from a game unless I absolutely have to, so I don't ever just quit to quit. I want to play, but a lot of the time I just can't. I wish there was a system set up so that you can tell intentional quitters from those who genuinely get disconnected because of other reasons, but there isn't. Until there is, be weary that you might not be able to play.
Amazing game. Love it. Worth all of the time and money
Never play it if you want to stay happy

이겜이 뭐라고 이렇게빠져서 하고있는건지...
썩은매칭 썩은 인성 그렇다고 쉬운살인마 하면 좋다고 티베깅하고 어려운살인마하면
어려운거했다고 티베깅하고..
취향만 맞으면 정말 한도끝도없이 생각나고 취향이 어긋나면 그냥 거들떠도 안보게된다.
그것도 그건데 그 취향에 맞는지 안맞는지,혹은 진짜 재미를 찾거나, 맞춰보는데에 100시간정도가 걸린다 요즘 누가 그시간을 바쳐서 겜이 취향이 맞는지 확인을 하겠는가..하지만 그 분기점만 넘긴다면 정말 재미있는게임이다
이게임을 하는 사람분들에게 부탁드릴게있다면 쉬운살인마 만나면 좀 그냥 문열고 나가세요 착하게 해야 자라나는 싹이 크죠 그싹을 크기전에 (게임에 재미를 느끼기전에)  놀리고 티베깅하고 하면 누가 이게임을 하겠습니까 즐겁게 게임 합시다.

Incredible game with very varied gameplays for killers and nervous and stressful gameplay for survivors.
I recommend playing with several survivors for a better experience.

Concerning the killers, several styles of game to suit everyone: rogue, deceitful, discreet. It's a pleasure to be able to play iconic characters like Scream, Michael Myers or Freddy Krueger.

The biggest advantage of this game is that there is no routine that installs, each part is different from the previous one and that, whether you are survivor main or killer main. Overall, an excellent game to try alone or with your friends.

19/20
